ocredit: This is the story of how we died... Brothers & Sisters.
ocredit-1: Has it yet been eons or centuries? I've forgotten.
ocredit-2: Perhaps we should begin at the start, on the day we hatched.
ocredit-3: Yet unfamiliar with the world, wide-eyed and vulnerable.
ocredit-4: Still well guarded we were, for our parentage were the strongest of our kind.
